comment: Elkins made TPS1107 really easy, she accepted late work until the last week of finals and was an easy grader. Loved her class. Until she accused me of AI and copying other students in the last week. It'd be quite hard to use AI on a production response for a production that IS NOT ON THE INTERNET AT ALL. Instead of a high B I got a D.

The online version of her course sucked, she didnt even release/unlock the modules until 3-weeks into the semester, she doesn't seem to care about her online students. She lacks understanding at times. I think she would have been great in person, definitely not online. It's an easy course, but her unattentiveness makes it more challenging.

Lots of great reviews because this is a pretty straightforward class. However, Samantha Elkins made it more difficult with consistent errors with the modules and content, no updates, no announcements, and some assignments felt like they were out of the blue—no feedback on essays, and not a good emailer. She is not attentive, expect to do it alone!
Great class overall! Easy A if you do classwork and final project. Takes attendance everyday.
Great professor, she is hilarious and her lectures are very entertaining. assignments are super easy, final is a group project, very fun

Interesting lectures and she's very nice. You need to participate in class because she assigns you to a group for a group projects, which is your final exam at the end of the semester. Take it seriously because she grades more strict for that project but it's so easy. Very easy reading assignments and quizzes that she sometimes opens up at the end.

Professor Elkins was a breath of fresh air: she was funny, clear on what's expected, and didn't assign hard homework. She used no lockdown browser for exams or quizzes. When she tells you to watch three plays at the school, WATCH THEM!!! The third play was hard to find before the deadline and there's an essay due for all three!!
rating_tags: Group projects--Amazing lectures --Graded by few things

comment: Hilarious professor! She does grade slowly and forgets to release assignments if that is your concern. Expect to see three shows and write an essay for them. She has a clear rubric on what to write. The final is a group performance in which you'll start halfway through the semester. Do your best!

Samantha Elkins' lectures are entertaining and funny. The assignments are not too difficult, but some are harder than the others. The final is a group performance that you and your group work on for about half the semester, but besides that, the class is relatively easy. My only complaint is she would forget to release assignments or announcements.

Professor Elkins is a great professor. In her class she requires that you see three plays and write an essay on each of them, you also have to pay for your own ticket. The final is a group project where you come up with your own 5-7 minute play and perform it in class. She has a textbook but barely uses it like we had to read it like twice.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Amazing teacher. Got a 100 on basically everything in class. It's straight forward and very easy as long as you follow directions. You do have a 5-7 minute play you have to write in a group and perform at the end of the semester. Some online quizzes and exams. You also have to see 3 plays, it's super easy and she's Ana amazing teacher!
